profile: Proactive and detail-oriented Data Analyst, having recently completed the intensive Data Analyst program at John Bryce. Proficient in SQL, Python (Pandas), Excel, and Power BI for data extraction, transformation, and visualization. Seeking to leverage my analytical skills to turn complex data into actionable insights and contribute to a data-driven team.
projects: Data analysis on Amazon forest deforestation with Python and Pandas
Data analysis for AdventureWorks DB (Power BI)
Data analysis with Excel for Super Store (Excel - download locally)
